# Templates Directory - Agent Guide

## Purpose

This directory contains templates for creating standardized documentation files across the project.

## Key Files

| File                 | Purpose                                                  |
| -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| `AGENTS.md.template` | Template for creating new AGENTS.md files in directories |

## Usage

When creating a new directory that needs an AGENTS.md file:

1. Copy the template: `cp docs/templates/AGENTS.md.template new-dir/AGENTS.md`
2. Replace all bracketed placeholders with actual content
3. Delete the "Template Instructions" section at the bottom
4. Remove any sections that don't apply to your directory

- [Root AGENTS.md](../../AGENTS.md) - Project-level agent guide
- [Backend AGENTS.md](../../backend/AGENTS.md) - Example backend guide
